discussiontools-preference-description:
Enable a new workflow for [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/replying replying to specific comments] on talk pages.

Please note that over time new tools for interacting with talk pages will be added.

Updates about these features will be posted on the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Updates talk pages project's updates page].
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: You are not logged in. To receive attribution with your name instead of your IP address, you can [$1 log in] or [$2 create an account].
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: $1 has been transformed into your signature. To undo this, type $2. Note: typing $1 to sign your comments using this tool is not required; it will add your signature automatically.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: By clicking "$1", you agree to the terms of use for this wiki.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Your comment will be saved at [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Could not find the comment you're replying to on the page. It might have been deleted or moved to another page. Please reload the page and try again.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: The "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" link cannot be used to reply to this comment. To reply, please use the full page editor by clicking "$1".
The "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" link cannot be used to reply to this comment because it is loaded from another page. To reply, please go here: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-lint: Comments on this page can't be replied to because of an error in the wikitext. You can learn about this error by [$1 reading the documentation], ask for help by [$2 posting here] or fix the error by [$3 opening the full page editor].
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: User edited an existing comment with DiscussionTools
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: User added a new topic to the page with DiscussionTools
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: User replied to a comment with DiscussionTools
